messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Phil, this one's for you
messages.msgSnippet: OMG!!!  I had read that he only had two daughters!!!  If the son favored him, it looks like Watsuki was on the mark with his vision of Sagara Souzou as well.
messages.messageBody:
OMG!!! I had read that he only had two daughters!!! If the son favored him, it looks like Watsuki was on the mark with his vision of Sagara Souzou as well. That's incredible!!!

SANO!!! (uh... I just started a fic that's going to reveal Sano to actually be Sagara's son... you're teasing me, right, Masayoshi?... this ain't his son at all... you just found a pic of a beautiful little boy to drive me nuts with, ne? :-) )

Does it give a name to him? Why do we have a picture of the son and not the father? Father's pics destroyed, I wonder?

phil & pachi (neither of whom needed THIS much excitement when they're trying to set up an LJ community!)

Hirotada Tokugawa <patriot014@...> wrote:
A picture of Sagara Souzou's son, Kawajirou:

http://www.dokidoki.ne.jp/home2/quwatoro/bakumatu3/sagara.html

--Masayoshi
